profileAlternative.name: Subir Kumar Pal
profileAlternative.headline: HTML Developer at Unified Infotech Pvt. Ltd.
profileAlternative.summary:
I've been doing front-end development for the past 7 years specializing in HTML5/CSS3/jQuery development and RESPONSIVE design. My aim to write the most beautiful code possible.

My HTML and CSS are validated, search engine optimized and easily up-datable. My Work is always delivered on-time or ahead of schedule and it's my job to ensure you never have to deal with ugly old code ever again.
